website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to stash some small items around the bathroom or while on a vacation.
pros: Twist off top blends seamlessly with the rest of the brush when closed
Brush bristles and handle feel authentic
Interior safe has room for cash or small personal items
cons: Top requires a good tug to securely fasten

customer_reviews.title: Crew Review
customer_reviews.text: I'm a flight attendant who has had issues with hotel staff around the world going through my things when they know I'm gone. This not only works to hide any extra cash I have but actually works as a brush! I even use it at home to style my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denison Tilley

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is excellent, just as described, and works well. I managed to secret 20 hundred dollar bills in it without having to roll them up too tightly. I think I could have done 25 or more, but I didn't want to give the bills a permanent bend. By the way, it's already my favorite hairbrush and has replaced my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It looks and works just like a regular brush, has a hidden compartment where you can easily put 10 $1 dollar bills
customer_reviews.text: This brush is incredible! I really never thought I’d use it. I bought it to put some cash in while on vacation and ended up using it as a hair brush lol. To be honest it’s better than the hair brushes I have and still after months of having it and USING It the brush is as it was when I received it. The opening to the secret compartment is still tightly closed and I do open it a lot to put money in so I’ll always have extra cash when I need it. I’m planning on going to Florida next month and this brush will definitely be with me.
customer_reviews.author: rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Truly hides cash. I wish it had some sort of locking mechanism, but it works too keep the attention off of you money. Don't put too many bills in here or they will be hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Definetly recomended!
customer_reviews.text: It it a great brush, works and functions as a real hair brush 😂 love it! Discreetly hides my stash, can not tell at all that it has a secret compartment.. Can fit over a size of roll of qaurters in it.. And it better than the fake hairspray, or other coke cans that do not function like a normal item...
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach bag
customer_reviews.text: Great to take travelling or to the beach. An excellent way to stash bills or a key. It is always hard to secure valuables when you go swimming at the beach or pool. This brush avoids the issue because you do not need to conceal the brush. And who steals a used brush?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, SHODDY WORKMANSHIP!!!
customer_reviews.text: The idea is very clever, but I had it for less than a week when the lid you screw on & off cracked making the whole purpose of the item worthless. Buy one from someone with good reviews, this one was VERY cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: dancer513

customer_reviews.title: that I like it so much as a brush I haven't put ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little stash safe! Problem is, that I like it so much as a brush I haven't put anything in it yet! Good size and fully fictional in many ways. I'm pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Luna YTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for traveling. Its a good size. I expected that I could use it on my hair and did not bring another brush. It works okay for that, but do not use it with a hair dryer because it will melt. :(
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I love how this brush diversion safe is a two in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this brush diversion safe is a two in one! Actually really good quality brush and I thought the hidden stash part popped off but it screws in which is nice for quality assurance. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzy

customer_reviews.title: Diameter bigger than other brushes makes it noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the brush it’s just that the diameter is to big. It seems to be out of place with other brushes of its kind. So it gives it a noticeably factor. If your trying to hide something make it look like others of the same kind so it will blend in. But that being said it functions fine.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nykiel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Can't even tell it has a hiding spot. Will be using on an upcoming trip sharing a house with 10 other people, so will have to see if it stands up to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Grei

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! Can stash my smoke in it and can't smell ANYTHING through it! I keep it in my purse and use it as a regular brush sometimes too :)
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Whitler

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Totally works! Store keys money notes on combo etc no one can tell brush is a safe - and works well as a brush
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian79

customer_reviews.title: A bit overly large
customer_reviews.text: The roller brush is way to large. I would recommend the cans. Like the hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie hilla

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this brush that has secret compartment for cash, key.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the cap wasn't so obvious. I'm sure people aren't inspecting other people's hair brushes. Other than that though it's a great place to stash stuff and a pretty sweet hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Nice place to stash some cash or "medicine"
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I expected, works fine as a brush and doesn't feel cheap. Shipped fast and well packaged. Great little stash space.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product,great delivery
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and handed the brush to my wife and she didnt notice it was a stash,last night I used this to surprise her for her birthday with a roll of 100's and ring for our anniversary, Great product and shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: alexcruz

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad deal
customer_reviews.text: Top looks a bit obvious but I used it a few times on my hair to give a worn look before traveling. At least made it little more work for someone looking to take your cash.
customer_reviews.author: Datblondenurse

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in checked luggage
customer_reviews.text: "Treats" in a vacuum sealed bag, rolled up inside brush made it safely to destination through airlines checked baggage. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: blehblehbleh

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent! Amazing safe, amazing brush!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I traveled to Europe with it. Both in my check in baggage and in my carry on. I was able to fit around 60 bills plus, my rings. My husband is impressed and wants to buy one too. It is also a great brush. Better than any of my brushes! I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought item for my daughter to hide money while she attends college and has roommates. Works well
customer_reviews.author: A. Banos

customer_reviews.title: great secret money stash,  and even great functional brush
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the plain sight aspect of this little stash brush... And it's actually a real nice hair brush, so that's a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: əmmåpïråtə

customer_reviews.title: ... bristles tend to fall a lot but it works great I use it daily to brush my hair and ...
customer_reviews.text: The bristles tend to fall a lot but it works great I use it daily to brush my hair and the money compartment is great you can never be too safe with people around your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very clever hiding place for small valuables such as cash on a trip or small jewelery. Brush is great too!
customer_reviews.author: serenityseeker22

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than 20 bills
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like a normal hairbrush. Should work well. Good capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH MONEY WILL GET STUCK
customer_reviews.text: WORKS I GUESS. MADE THE MISTAKE OF PUTTING IN TOO MANY BILLS . WENT IN FINE BUT NOW AFTER TRYING EVERYTHING I CAN THINK OF . I CANT SEEM TO GET THEM OUT!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Fun for family gift money wouldn't get stolen out of there purses
customer_reviews.author: Jeanise

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $7.48 it's a good price .No one will know that I have hidden money inside .That's US$1,000 in the picture. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lenh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good brush and safety compartment for travelling or at home.
customer_reviews.author: ShayP

customer_reviews.title: Blends in
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush! Is will blend it with my other hair stuff
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Hide your brush is great
customer_reviews.text: This is great, in plain sight and not even noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I received the product. I'm looking forward to using ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product. I'm looking forward to using it on my trip to see if anyone notices it has a safety compartment. I will keep you posted after my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: The second day I had this I dropped it on the floor (like 3 feet) and the handle broke clean off. Not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: The girls loved this gift not only a safe but a brush I got big hugs
customer_reviews.author: Pat Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: The brush came in a plain brown box and not the box pictured. Hard to give as a gift when not in original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: txkaty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great diversion safe just small and can't get a lot inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product to hide valuables. Dropped it and broke handle. Am reordering
customer_reviews.author: l Carey

customer_reviews.title: The brush is actually useable so that is a plus ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush is actually useable so that is a plus. With the cap on you can't tell it's anything but a regular brush. Gave it 3 stars because I dropped it the very first day I had it and the lid broke. That piece is cheaply made and now it's not useable for me.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase! I actually use the hair brush more than the safe portion! I love that the hairbrush is a very good quality. I brought this with me to Thailand and kept my money hidden inside. Also great for bringing to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very great and easy to hide stuff in no one knows
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Bought another for a gift and they also loved it
customer_reviews.author: tealyfish

product_meta.title: Hair Brush Diversion Stash Safe 2018 Model - Secret Lid On Top Opens
